short_summary: Janitorial Services At the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa
description: The Canadian Space Agency wants to retain janitorial services from an organization specialized in the provision of building cleaning at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Janitorial Services at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa**

**Reference Number:** cb-4630-86135263
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 9F023-20210410
**Publication Date:** 2023-04-06
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-21 14:00:00

**Contract Overview**

The Canadian Space Agency is seeking a supplier to provide janitorial services for the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa. The contract period is expected to commence on June 1, 2023, and conclude on May 31, 2024, with an option to extend the contract for up to five years.

**Services Provided**

The successful bidder will be required to provide comprehensive janitorial services, including but not limited to:

* Cleaning of interior and exterior surfaces
* Trash and recyclable waste management
* Cleaning of restrooms
* Vacuuming and carpet maintenance
* Maintenance of cleaning equipment

**Work Location**

The services will be performed at the David Florida Laboratory (3701 Carling Avenue, CP11490, Succ. H, Ottawa, Ontario, K2H 8S2).

**Security Requirements**

Security requirements apply to this contract. Bidders must ensure they have the necessary security clearances and follow the procurement entity's procedures.

**Optional Site Visit**

A site visit has been scheduled for April 14, 2023, at 09:00 EDT. The site visit will take place at the David Florida Laboratory (3701 Carling Avenue, CP11490, Succ. H, Ottawa, Ontario, K2H 8S2). Bidders are invited to attend the site visit to familiarize themselves with the work location.

**Contracting Entity**

The Canadian Space Agency is the contracting entity for this procurement.

**Award Criteria**

The award will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions**

The successful bidder must be able to provide services within Canada.

**Documents**

A comprehensive draft of the tender evaluation criteria and the awarding method will be included in the tender document package. 

Available on the Canadabuys website:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4630/9f023-20210410--rfp-final
